Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-20260 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-20260 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.9-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package clamav is earlier than 1.0.9-1, affected by CVE-2025-20260
